MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn, affecting properties in Douglas Wynd and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out some repairs onsite to our underground cable network after damage to an electrical box on Douglas Wynd and we now require further network investigations onsite and we now expect your supply to be restored by 4pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.50am on Monday 21st December 2020.
